content.raw:
Hi Steven,
I think that I have a solution temporally:
Instead include a sensor in a model within its model.sdf, make a sensor model (like hokuyo) and when you include it in your model.sdf, rotate 90º in his pose like that:
    <include>
	  <uri>model://gp2y</uri>
	  <pose>0 0 0 0 1.57 0</pose>
	</include>

This code turn the sensor 90º right down, if you want to turn 90º right up it would be -1.57.

I hope this help by now.
Sorry for my English.
